project_abstract.cdata: The Rural Electrification Project comprises: (a) 275 kV Kenyir-Tanah Merah transmission line; (b) about 120 km of 132 kV transmission lines and substations; (c) rural distribution network in Kedah, Kelantan, Trengganu and Pahang States; (d) minihydro schemes; and (e) consulting services for the 275 kV line and minihydro schemes. The project covers a three-year time slice of the rural electrification program for the States which will result in the supply of electricity to about 130,000 households.
